scripts.start: pnpm run config:env && pnpm run kill:emulator && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.start:test: pnpm run config:env && pnpm run kill:emulator && turbo run dev:test --parallel
scripts.build: pnpm run config:env && turbo run build
scripts.test: pnpm run build && start-server-and-test start:test 3000 test:platform
scripts.test:platform: sleep 35 && CYPRESS_DISPLAY_PATH_TIMEOUT=50000 CYPRESS_ONLY_TEST_ONE_PATIENT=false CYPRESS_SKIP_WELLNESS_CHECK=false npx cypress run
scripts.config:env: firebase use movet-care-staging && yes | cp -rf apps/.env apps/movetcare.com/.env.local && source apps/movetcare.com/.env.local && yes | cp -rf apps/.env apps/app.movetcare.com/.env.local && source apps/app.movetcare.com/.env.local && yes | cp -rf apps/.env apps/admin.movetcare.com/.env.local && source apps/admin.movetcare.com/.env.local
scripts.update: ncu -u && pnpm -r run update && pnpm clean && cd mobile && npm run update
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:logs && pnpm run clean:modules && pnpm run clean:builds && pnpm run clean:lock && pnpm run clean:turbo && pnpm install && pnpm update && pnpm build --force
scripts.clean:builds: find ./ -name .next -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name dist -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name build -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name lib -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.clean:lock: find ./ -name packages-lock.json -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name yarn.lock -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name pnpm-lock.yaml -type f -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.push:prod: git checkout main && git merge development && git push origin main && git checkout development
scripts.push:all: pnpm run push:stage && pnpm run push:prod
scripts.push:all:no-verify: pnpm run push:stage:no-verify && pnpm run push:prod:no-verify
scripts.push:stage:no-verify: git checkout development && git push origin development --no-verify
scripts.push:prod:no-verify: git checkout main && git merge development && git push origin main --no-verify && git checkout development
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use movet-care && firebase deploy --non-interactive -f && firebase use movet-care-staging && git checkout development && pnpm run ping:deploy:success:prod
scripts.deploy:stage: firebase use movet-care-staging && firebase deploy --non-interactive -f && pnpm run ping:deploy:success:stage
scripts.backup:production: gcloud config set project movet-care && gcloud firestore export gs://movet-care-backups && gcloud config set project movet-care-staging
